programme.title: Bhoothnath Returns
programme.desc: Sequel to the 2008 movie, this supernatural-comedy movie is based on Kailash Nath (Amitabh Bachchan) aka Bhoothnath. Bhoothnath returns to Earth in order to redeem himself after he is mocked by his fellow ghost friends over his abilities to scare children. Unfortunately, Bhoothnath fails in scaring Akhrot, a young boy. Akhrot then cracks a deal with him under which he helps Bhoothnath in scaring kids, while in return Bhoothnath has to pretend to be scared of Akhrot. Soon, the duo starts helping the ghosts trapped in under-construction sites by fulfilling their last wishes and helping their families. After discovering the level of corruption in India, Akhrot and Bhoothnath contest the elections against an influential but corrupt politician Bhau. The two are threatened by Bhau and his men, which leads to one of them struggling for survival. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: Taarzan: The Wonder Car
programme.desc: A young man converts his father's old car into an amazing wonder car named Tarzan. The car comes alive as it is possessed by his father's spirit. Soon, it also starts killing his father's murderers. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Bhaag Milkha Bhaag
programme.desc: Milkha Singh, the Flying Sikh, overcomes many agonising obstacles to become a world champion, Olympian and one of India's most iconic athletes. Milkha Singh, who was scarred by the brutal partition of British India, joins the Indian military and is subsequently motivated to represent India at the Olympics. Showcases the trials and tribulations that Milkha Singh had to undergo subsequently on his path to becoming the Flying Sikh. (Film - Biography/Biopic)

programme.title: Movie In Focus
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes program that includes the making and a chat with the cast and crew of the movie. (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: Hop
programme.desc: E.B, the Easter Bunny's teenage son, is expected to take over his father's role the coming Easter. However, he runs away to Hollywood to join a rock 'n' roll band as a drummer. In LA, E. B meets with an accident when Fred injures him with his car, who offers to provide him shelter until he recovers. Fred must help E.B get back to Easter Island in time to save Easter. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: Movie In Focus
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes program that includes the making and a chat with the cast and crew of the movie. (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: Logan
programme.desc: In the distant future, a weary Logan provides for an ailing Professor X with the help of Caliban. His hideaway is exposed when he inadvertently becomes the protector of Laura, a young mutant on the run from a corporation and its hoodlums. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Movie In Focus
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes program that includes the making and a chat with the cast and crew of the movie. (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: Percy Jackson: Sea Of Monsters
programme.desc: Percy Jackson, the son of Posedion, decides to uphold Thalia's sacrifice. Thalia had sacrificed herself to get the others into her camp and her father Zeus found another way for her to live by transforming her into a pine tree, creating a magical border around the camp so that no other half-blood would suffer from a fate as she did. For this, he embarks on a journey, with his friends Annabeth, Clarisse and half-brother, Tyson, to the Sea of Monsters to find the Golden Fleece which has the power to save their home and training ground, Camp Half-Blood. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Captain America: Civil War
programme.desc: The Avengers stand on opposite sides when world leaders try to interfere with their activities. With the two superhero factions--led by Captain America and Iron Man--pit against each other, are the Avengers doomed. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Croods
programme.desc: Grug and his family embark on a journey to search for a new place to live after their cave is destroyed. A young boy helps them trek through unknown places to find new shelter. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: The Incredibles
programme.desc: Forced to adopt a civilian identity and stuck in a white-collar job, Mr Incredible itches to get back into action. When he is lured into a trap by the evil Syndrome, his family contrives to save him. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: The New Mutants
programme.desc: A bunch of five young mutants who have suffered traumatic experiences are admitted into a secret facility. While they believe they are undergoing treatment to cure them of the dangers of their superpowers, they soon begin experiencing terrifying visions related to their past and question the safety of the institution. (Film - Horror)

programme.title: MasterChef Australia
programme.desc: To win the much-coveted immunity pin, the four contestants must face a trial by fire, designed by restaurateur Scott Pickett. (TV Show - Reality - Talent)

programme.title: Kingsman: The Secret Service
programme.desc: Gary 'Eggsy' Unwin, an unrefined but promising street kid, gets recruited and trained as an agent for a secret spy organisation. He goes through the organisation's gruelling training programme while a global threat emerges from an eccentric genius. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Kingsman: The Golden Circle
programme.desc: The headquarters of the Kingsman organisation is destroyed by Poppy Adams, a psychotic leader of the world's largest drug cartel, the Golden Circle. Although Eggsy and Merlin survive the attack, they need help to go against the resourceful drug cartel and contact their allies in the United States. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Tomorrowland
programme.desc: Starring Academy Award winner George Clooney, this sci-fi adventure follows the exploits of Casey, a curious teenager, and Frank, a disengaged former inventor, who embark on a dangerous mission to unravel the secrets of Tomorrowland, an unexplored dimension in time and space. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: The Lion King
programme.desc: Directed by Roger Allers and Rob Minkoff, 'The Lion King' follows the life of the endearing young lion Simba who is the heir to the throne of his father Mufasa who rules the animal kingdom. But Simba's evil uncle Scar plots to kill him and his father to occupy the throne. The plan succeeds partially with Mufasa being bumped off by Scar. Simba manages to escape and returns to his birthplace on becoming an adult only to see Scar as the ruler. He immediately plots to take over the kingdom with his pals. But wily Scar is no minnow. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Undisputed III: Redemption
programme.desc: (Film - Action)

programme.title: Undisputed
programme.desc: An action movie that narrates the story of a heavyweight champion called George Iceman Chambers who lands in prison where the resident gangster arranges a boxing match with the reigning prison champion. (Film - Drama)

programme.title: Captain America: Civil War

programme.title: The Good Dinosaur
programme.desc: Set in an alternate universe where both dinosaurs and humans exist, this animated adventure follows the unlikely friendship between Arlo, an Apatosaurus, and a feral caveboy. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Within These Walls
programme.desc: A single mother breaks up with her boyfriend and asks him to move out of their house when things do not work for her. However, she soon starts experiencing strange happenings in the house. (Film - Tele Film)

programme.title: The Call of the Wild
programme.desc: Buck, a gentle and large dog, is kidnapped from his California home and shipped to the wilderness of Yukon. After being sold to Perrault, who runs a dog sled mail service, he gets introduced to a pack of other dogs led by Spitz, a Husky, and slowly becomes popular, much to the chagrin of Spitz. Meanwhile, he strikes an unlikely and beautiful friendship with John Thornton, a loner, who, eventually helps him discover his place in the world. (Film - Adventure)

programme.title: Despicable Me 3
programme.desc: After being fired from the Anti-Villain League, Gru sets out to meet his long-lost twin, Dru, for the first time. But he is soon forced to team up with his brother to take down Balthazar Bratt, a former child star, whose obsession with his 80s character turns him into a supervillain. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Chinese Zodiac
programme.desc: With the 12 ancient animal signs of the 'Chinese Zodiac' stolen, Asian Hawk, brought to life by the phenomenal Jackie Chan who also doubles up as the director of this adrenaline-pumping action film, a mercenary, sets out to retrieve them. Accompanied by a Chinese student and a Parisian lady, Hawk bears it all to emerge successful in this film, which is known to be the third highest grosser in China and also earned two Guinness World Records. (Film - Action)

programme.desc: (Film - Action)

programme.title: Cars 2
programme.desc: (Film - Animation)

programme.title: The Lion King
programme.desc: Mufasa, the noble lion king of the Pride Lands of Africa, is killed trying to save his young son from a trap set by his evil brother Scar. He then declares himself king and tries to kill Simba. However, Simba escapes and grows up in the company of outcasts Timon and Pumbaa, a meerkat and warthog. Years later, Simba has a chance encounter with Nala the lioness who urges him to return to the pride and take his rightful place as the king. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Prince Of Persia: The Sands Of Time
programme.desc: With the help of a special, magical dagger that can help reverse time, a young prince and a princess must stop an evil villain whose actions threaten to destroy the world. (Film - Action)

programme.title: TRON: Legacy
programme.desc: Sam misses his father, a virtual world designer, and enters a virtual space that has become much more dangerous than his father intended. Now, both father and son embark upon a life-and-death journey. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Toy Story
programme.desc: In Andy's absence, his toys come to life and engage in a discussion. Woody, Andy's favourite cowboy doll, is worried that after Andy's birthday, wherein his mother would gift him a new toy, Buzz Lightyear, his importance may get reduced. He thus hatches a plan to eliminate Buzz, but they both end up fighting at a gas station and are left behind as Andy drives away. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: The Boss Baby
programme.desc: Seven-year-old Tim is envious of his baby brother. But his animosity towards him doesn't last long when he learns that this baby, who calls himself The Boss, can talk and behave like an adult and is on a mission to stop Puppy Co from replacing the love for babies with puppies. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Ant-Man
programme.desc: Based on a Marvel Comics character, 'Ant-Man' has Paul Rudd playing the superhero whose suit gives him the power to shrink in size. He is tasked with using his abilities to stop Darren from creating a destructive weapon with the same technology. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Fantastic Four: Rise Of The Silver Surfer
programme.desc: The Silver Surfer, an intergalactic herald serving Galactus, plans to destroy the Earth for his master. However, four superheroes must intervene and battle the villainous force to save the planet. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Armageddon
programme.desc: When NASA learns that an enormous asteroid is all set to destroy Earth, it recruits Harry, a deep sea oil driller, and his crew, in order to drill a hole in the asteroid and plant a nuclear bomb in it. In the midst of this, Harry must also deal with his daughter's lover, who is a part of the mission. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Filler
programme.desc: (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: Turbo
programme.desc: A garden snail named Theo dreams of winning the Indy 500 race. But his obsession with speed makes him an outcast in the slow-paced snail community. Later, an accident fuses Theo's DNA with nitrous oxide, gifting him incredible speed and accuracy. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: A Brush With Love
programme.desc: Jamie Spellman, the owner of an art school and a struggling painter, makes a painting for a competition. Later, she tries to find someone in her life who resembles the man in her painting. (Film - Tele Film)

programme.title: Johnny English Reborn
programme.desc: A possible assassination of the Chinese premier and a conspiracy involving the MI-7, KGB and the CIA force the bosses at MI-7 to recall their brave but unconventional agent, Johnny English, who after a failed mission is seeking a shot at redemption. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2
programme.desc: The Guardians are hired by the Sovereign, an alien race, to retrieve their batteries, but Rocket ends up stealing them. In the chase that ensues, they're rescued by Peter's father, and he sets out to discover his parentage, only to reunite with his friends to save the galaxy once again. (Film - Action)

programme.title: 47 Ronin
programme.desc: When Oishi, a samurai, is released from captivity, he learns that his master, Lord Asano, was bewitched into attacking Lord Kira, who wanted to rule the Ako Domain. He gathers 47 ronin and Kai, a half-breed to avenge his master's death. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Goal! The Dream Begins
programme.desc: Santiago always had a dream of playing professional soccer but couldn't do much about it. He started following his father's footsteps and started supporting the family, until a life changing opportunity strikes him. (Film - Drama)

programme.title: The Adventurers
programme.desc: Dan Cheung, an infamous thief, is imprisoned after he miscalculates a heist. When he is released five years later, Dan plans another heist with his old partner and a new recruit. However, Pierre, a French detective, is hot on his trail and tries to recruit Dan's ex-fiance to help bring him to justice. (Film - Action)

programme.title: John Wick
programme.desc: In this action thriller, the dashing Keanu Reeves dons the role of 'John Wick', a hitman who follows the path of harmony upon falling in love with Helen. When she dies of an illness, she leaves behind a dog to help him come to grips with the situation. But when a bunch of men attack John and kill the puppy, he springs back into action and hunts down every man responsible for the act, including his former employer's son. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Bourne Identity
programme.desc: A man with a bullet-ridden body is found and looked after by strangers. He wakes up to a blank memory and begins a journey to find out his identity. The road ahead is full of danger and conspiracy. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Undisputed
programme.desc: An action movie that narrates the story of a heavyweight champion called George Iceman Chambers who lands in prison where the resident gangster arranges a boxing match with the reigning prison champion. (Film - Drama)

programme.desc: Naitik does not heed to Gayatri's advice and decides to take Akshara to meet Rashmi; when Naitik sees some boys smoking in front of Akshara, he fights with them. (TV Show - Drama)

programme.title: Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai
programme.desc: Naitik skips his dose of Ayurvedic medicine; Kaveri and Gayatri are worried when Akshara falls sick after eating ice cream. (TV Show - Drama)

programme.title: Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai
programme.desc: Akshara asks Naitik to accompany her to the doctor for a regular check-up; Kaveri and Gayatri plan to host a function when Akshara is six months pregnant. (TV Show - Drama)

programme.title: Radha Krishn

programme.title: Ek Veer Ki Ardaas... Veera

programme.title: Saath Nibhaana Saathiya

programme.desc: An elite group of profilers analyse the nation's most dangerous criminal minds in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strike again. programme.title: The Pacifier
programme.desc: Vin Diesel dons the role of an FBI agent who is allotted the most bizarre assignment of his life in this rib-tickling and enthralling film. Unable to save a brilliant scientist from enemy forces, Vin is tasked with protecting his family, which includes his wife, four children, an infant and a pet duck. Armed with sippers, baby carriers and his guns he must make sure he can don the role of 'The Pacifier' in the tumultuous course of events. (Film - Family)

programme.title: Movie In Focus
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes program that includes the making and a chat with the cast and crew of the movie. (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: Iron Man 3
programme.desc: Tony Stark, an eccentric billionaire, philanthropist and also the Iron man, encounters a formidable foe called the Mandarin. After almost losing everything in a battle with his enemy, Tony embarks on a journey with relentless consequences and a suit that ceases to exist. Will the Iron man overcome his failure and defeat his obdurate adversary. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Rambo: First Blood Part II
programme.desc: John Rambo is offered the chance to cut short his prison tenure by going on a secret mission for the US government deep into the jungles of Vietnam and locating American POWs. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Turbo
programme.desc: A garden snail named Theo dreams of winning the Indy 500 race. But his obsession with speed makes him an outcast in the slow-paced snail community. Later, an accident fuses Theo's DNA with nitrous oxide, gifting him incredible speed and accuracy. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Johnny English Strikes Again
programme.desc: In the third instalment of the 'Johnny English' series, English, a retired M17 agent, currently working as a geography teacher, is entrusted with a secret mission. He teams up with his old aide Bough to investigate a cyber-attack that revealed the identity of Britain's intelligence agents. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: X-Men: Apocalypse
programme.desc: An immensely powerful ancient mutant rises again and wishes to cleanse humankind in order to create a new world order. He recruits some powerful mutants, making them believe that mutants are superior to humans and it is their right to rule. To counter him, Raven tries to pull Charles out of his depressed state and lead a team of X-Men. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Home Alone 3
programme.desc: Eight-year-old Alex fends off thieves who are trying to acquire a top-secret computer chip that they have hidden in his toy car, with which they intend to help a terrorist group. (Film - Adventure)

programme.title: MasterChef Australia
programme.desc: Curtis Stone sets the bar high as he challenges the contestants to prepare dishes centred on butchery cuts of beef while demonstrating their learnings from the week. (TV Show - Reality - Talent)

programme.title: War For The Planet Of The Apes
programme.desc: When a rogue army of humans kills Caesar's wife and son, he sets out to exact revenge. But his quest for retribution reveals his darker instincts even as he makes a startling discovery. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Shanghai Knights
programme.desc: Jackie Chan and Owen Wilson reprise their roles as Chon and Roy and head to London to take revenge on the Chinese rebel who killed Chon's father. But during their pursuit, they stumble upon a dangerous conspiracy. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Pacific Rim: Uprising
programme.desc: Jake Pentecost, who had left his Jaeger training midway, gets a chance to live up to his father's legacy as he teams up with his estranged sister and former co-pilot to stop a new Kaiju threat. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Gladiator
programme.desc: (Film - Action)

programme.title: Filler
programme.desc: (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: Sinbad: Legend Of The Seven Seas
programme.desc: Superstar Brad Pitt lends his voice to the daredevil adventure-seeker from Middle East, Sinbad the Sailor, who is falsely accused of stealing a legendary magical Book of Peace. To make matters worse, malevolent goddess Eris puts forth a challenge giving Sinbad ten days to find the book or his childhood friend Prince Proteus will take the death penalty on his behalf. Sinbad and Proteus' fiancee Marina set out to face every obstacle that comes their way in order to save their dear Proteus. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Shrek
programme.desc: In a faraway swamp, in solitude, lives the green ogre 'Shrek', brought to life by the iconic Mike Myers. His lonely existence is infested with fairytale characters, sent there by the evil Lord Farquaad, who wants him to rescue his beautiful bride-to-be, Princess Fiona (Cameron Diaz) and thus, he sets out with Donkey, voiced by the unmatchable Eddie Murphy, to wage a war against a fire-breathing dragon and rescue the princess. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Captain America: Civil War
programme.desc: The Avengers stand on opposite sides when world leaders try to interfere with their activities. With the two superhero factions--led by Captain America and Iron Man--pit against each other, are the Avengers doomed. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Escape Plan
programme.desc: Ray, an expert in security systems, is framed for a crime and sent to a high-tech prison. However, he uses all his knowledge and special skills with a little inside help to escape the facility. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Incredibles
programme.desc: Forced to adopt a civilian identity and stuck in a white-collar job, Mr Incredible itches to get back into action. When he is lured into a trap by the evil Syndrome, his family contrives to save him. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Doomsday
programme.desc: (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Reign Of Fire
programme.desc: In the year 2020, the world has been ravaged by the dragons that were accidentally awakened from their slumber by humans. Now it is up to Quinn Abercromby (Christian Bale) and Denton Van Zan (Matthew McConaughey) to save mankind from annihilation. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Frozen
programme.desc: When the Snow Queen Elsa accidentally puts the kingdom in a state of infinite winter, Anna, her sister, teams up with Kristoff, an iceman, his loyal reindeer and Olaf, a snowman, to convince her to return and reverse the weather. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: MasterChef Australia
programme.desc: Curtis Stone sets the bar high as he challenges the contestants to prepare dishes centred on butchery cuts of beef while demonstrating their learnings from the week. (TV Show - Reality - Talent)

programme.title: Independence Day
programme.desc: Sci-fi director Roland Emmerich's 'Independence Day' is one of the highest-grossing films of all time and has also won the Academy Award for Best Visual Effects. It follows the efforts of a computer whiz (Jeff Goldblum) who foresaw the aliens' intent, a hot-shot pilot (Will Smith), the U.S. President (Bill Pullman) and a ragtag group of survivors who unite to save mankind after an alien race invades Earth and destroys most of its major cities. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: The Bourne Identity
programme.desc: A man with a bullet-ridden body is found and looked after by strangers. He wakes up to a blank memory and begins a journey to find out his identity. The road ahead is full of danger and conspiracy. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Finding Dory
programme.desc: In the spinoff of 2003 animated adventure movie, 'Finding Nemo', Dory, the forgetful tang fish, remembers her parents in a flashback. She ventures out on a journey to the Jewel of Morro Bay along with Merlin and Nemo. They encounter numerous struggles on the way until a childhood memory guides Dory home. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: In the wake of a zombie apocalypse, various survivors struggle to stay alive. As they search for safety and evade the undead, they are forced to grapple with rival groups and difficult choices. (TV Show - Horror)

programme.title: The Pacifier
programme.desc: Vin Diesel dons the role of an FBI agent who is allotted the most bizarre assignment of his life in this rib-tickling and enthralling film. Unable to save a brilliant scientist from enemy forces, Vin is tasked with protecting his family, which includes his wife, four children, an infant and a pet duck. Armed with sippers, baby carriers and his guns he must make sure he can don the role of 'The Pacifier' in the tumultuous course of events. (Film - Family)

programme.title: Movie In Focus
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes program that includes the making and a chat with the cast and crew of the movie. (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: Iron Man 3
programme.desc: Tony Stark, an eccentric billionaire, philanthropist and also the Iron man, encounters a formidable foe called the Mandarin. After almost losing everything in a battle with his enemy, Tony embarks on a journey with relentless consequences and a suit that ceases to exist. Will the Iron man overcome his failure and defeat his obdurate adversary. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Rambo: First Blood Part II
programme.desc: John Rambo is offered the chance to cut short his prison tenure by going on a secret mission for the US government deep into the jungles of Vietnam and locating American POWs. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Turbo
programme.desc: A garden snail named Theo dreams of winning the Indy 500 race. But his obsession with speed makes him an outcast in the slow-paced snail community. Later, an accident fuses Theo's DNA with nitrous oxide, gifting him incredible speed and accuracy. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Johnny English Strikes Again
programme.desc: In the third instalment of the 'Johnny English' series, English, a retired M17 agent, currently working as a geography teacher, is entrusted with a secret mission. He teams up with his old aide Bough to investigate a cyber-attack that revealed the identity of Britain's intelligence agents. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: X-Men: Apocalypse
programme.desc: An immensely powerful ancient mutant rises again and wishes to cleanse humankind in order to create a new world order. He recruits some powerful mutants, making them believe that mutants are superior to humans and it is their right to rule. To counter him, Raven tries to pull Charles out of his depressed state and lead a team of X-Men. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Home Alone 3
programme.desc: Eight-year-old Alex fends off thieves who are trying to acquire a top-secret computer chip that they have hidden in his toy car, with which they intend to help a terrorist group. (Film - Adventure)

programme.title: MasterChef Australia
programme.desc: Curtis Stone sets the bar high as he challenges the contestants to prepare dishes centred on butchery cuts of beef while demonstrating their learnings from the week. (TV Show - Reality - Talent)

programme.title: War For The Planet Of The Apes
programme.desc: When a rogue army of humans kills Caesar's wife and son, he sets out to exact revenge. But his quest for retribution reveals his darker instincts even as he makes a startling discovery. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Shanghai Knights
programme.desc: Jackie Chan and Owen Wilson reprise their roles as Chon and Roy and head to London to take revenge on the Chinese rebel who killed Chon's father. But during their pursuit, they stumble upon a dangerous conspiracy. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Pacific Rim: Uprising
programme.desc: Jake Pentecost, who had left his Jaeger training midway, gets a chance to live up to his father's legacy as he teams up with his estranged sister and former co-pilot to stop a new Kaiju threat. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Mortal Engines
programme.desc: In a post-apocalyptic world, cities ride on wheels and devour each other in order to survive. A woman named Hester Shaw rises to stop a large predator city and finds support in an outcast apprentice historian of London called Tom Natsworthy and a dangerous outlaw, Anna Fang. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Filler
programme.desc: (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: Pearl Harbor
programme.desc: Rafe and Danny, played by the dashing Ben Affleck and handsome Josh Hartnett, are childhood friends. Both of them share a love for planes and grow up to be Air Force pilots. When one of the two dies in battle, the other is left to fill the void of his friend's absence and move on. A romantic encounter takes place post the sudden tragedy. Directed by Michael Bay, the movie was nominated for four Academy Awards including Best Sound and Original Song, sung by Diane Warren. The movie bagged an award for Best Sound Editing. (Film - War)

programme.title: The Transporter
programme.desc: Hollywood action superstar Jason Statham essays the role of Frank Martin, a former Special Forces operator, who is hired by unknown clients to transport goods, human or otherwise, from one place to another. He is known to be the best in the business, as he transports anything without asking any questions and is always on time. However, complications arise when a job goes astray and he has to save the life of his female cargo. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Maleficent
programme.desc: Maleficent is a kind-hearted fairy, who wants peace to prevail in the kingdom. She is deceived by the love of her life, Stefan, who wants to be the king. In a turn of events, he cuts her wings and is crowned the king. A scorned Maleficent is hell-bent on attaining justice in her own ways. When she realises that Stefan is blessed with a daughter, Aurora, she places a curse on her. She reveals that on her sixteenth birthday, she will prick her finger on the spindle of a spinning wheel, which will cause her to fall into a deathlike sleep. Later, Maleficent realises that Aurora is the only one who can help restore peace in the kingdom and to her too. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Undisputed
programme.desc: An action movie that narrates the story of a heavyweight champion called George Iceman Chambers who lands in prison where the resident gangster arranges a boxing match with the reigning prison champion. (Film - Drama)

programme.title: The Game Plan
programme.desc: (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: Alice In Wonderland
programme.desc: Alice, now 19 years old, follows a rabbit in a blue coat to a magical wonderland from her dreams where she is reunited with her friends who make her realise her true destiny. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Turbo
programme.desc: A garden snail named Theo dreams of winning the Indy 500 race. But his obsession with speed makes him an outcast in the slow-paced snail community. Later, an accident fuses Theo's DNA with nitrous oxide, gifting him incredible speed and accuracy. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Hop
programme.desc: E.B, the Easter Bunny's teenage son, is expected to take over his father's role the coming Easter. However, he runs away to Hollywood to join a rock 'n' roll band as a drummer. In LA, E. B meets with an accident when Fred injures him with his car, who offers to provide him shelter until he recovers. Fred must help E.B get back to Easter Island in time to save Easter. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: MasterChef Australia
programme.desc: Top Australian chefs judge passionate home cooks who participate in competitive culinary challenges to develop their cooking skills and win the title of the best chef. (TV Show - Reality - Talent)

programme.title: The Little Mermaid
programme.desc: Ariel, a mermaid, flouts rules of the mermaid kingdom and gets fascinated with the human world. When she meets Prince Eric, she falls in love with him and resolves to find a way to be with him. In the process, she ends up striking a dangerous deal with Ursula, a sea witch. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: A Bug's Life
programme.desc: Flik, an odd ball of an ant, may be pint sized but he has tremendous courage. When the anthill he resides in is threatened by arrogant grasshoppers, he sets out to create an army to deal with them, recruiting the most incompetent bugs of course. A man with exceptional humour inducing skills, Dave Foley lends his voice to play Flik. Directors John Lasseter, and Andrew Stanton procure some of the biggest names on television and film for 'A Bug's Life'. Julia Louis-Dreyfuss, Kevin Spacey and Hayden Pannettiere are but a few. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Logan
programme.desc: In the distant future, a weary Logan provides for an ailing Professor X with the help of Caliban. His hideaway is exposed when he inadvertently becomes the protector of Laura, a young mutant on the run from a corporation and its hoodlums. (Film - Action)

(Film - Horror)

programme.desc: (Film - Fantasy)

(Film - Action)

programme.title: Ice Age: Collision Course

programme.desc: Three years after Jurassic World is destroyed, Claire Dennis, its former manager, is recruited to save its dinosaurs from an impending volcano. programme.desc: (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Honey, I Shrunk the Kids
programme.desc: The film, which is a directorial debut of Joe Johnston, tells the story of an absent-minded inventor who leaves his latest creation, an electromagnetic shrinking machine, unattended in his attic. The machine shrinks his and his neighbour's kids to 1/4-th of an inch, when they accidentally trigger it. When the newly tiny youngsters are tossed out with the trash, they must survive the long journey across the lawn. (Film - Family)

programme.title: Rise Of The Planet Of The Apes
programme.desc: Caesar, a chimpanzee, has been with Will ever since he was born, and, with a new drug, he can think and react like humans. When Caesar finds himself subjected to injustice, he decides to revolt. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: The Pacifier
programme.desc: Vin Diesel dons the role of an FBI agent who is allotted the most bizarre assignment of his life in this rib-tickling and enthralling film. Unable to save a brilliant scientist from enemy forces, Vin is tasked with protecting his family, which includes his wife, four children, an infant and a pet duck. Armed with sippers, baby carriers and his guns he must make sure he can don the role of 'The Pacifier' in the tumultuous course of events. (Film - Family)

programme.title: Goal! The Dream Begins
programme.desc: Santiago always had a dream of playing professional soccer but couldn't do much about it. He started following his father's footsteps and started supporting the family, until a life changing opportunity strikes him. (Film - Drama)

programme.title: The Bourne Supremacy
programme.desc: Jason Bourne is forced to return to his old ways as an assassin when he is wrongly framed in a CIA operation. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Call of the Wild
programme.desc: Buck, a gentle and large dog, is kidnapped from his California home and shipped to the wilderness of Yukon. After being sold to Perrault, who runs a dog sled mail service, he gets introduced to a pack of other dogs led by Spitz, a Husky, and slowly becomes popular, much to the chagrin of Spitz. Meanwhile, he strikes an unlikely and beautiful friendship with John Thornton, a loner, who, eventually helps him discover his place in the world. (Film - Adventure)

programme.title: MasterChef Australia
programme.desc: Top Australian chefs judge passionate home cooks who participate in competitive culinary challenges to develop their cooking skills and win the title of the best chef. (TV Show - Reality - Talent)

programme.title: Toy Story 2

programme.title: Doom
programme.desc: A group of space marines travels to Mars to investigate the mishaps in a research facility. However, they find themselves under threat after being attacked by strange creatures. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Movie In Focus
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes program that includes the making and a chat with the cast and crew of the movie. (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: Land Of The Lost
programme.desc: Palaeontologist Dr Rick Marshall, along with his assistant and a bumpkin, accidentally gets transported back in time to a world of danger, intelligent dinosaurs and lizard people. (Film - Adventure)

programme.title: R.I.P.D.
programme.desc: Bobby Hayes and his aide Nick Walker, who work as detectives for the Boston Police Department, steal gold while they are on duty. Bobby kills Nick so that he doesn't return the booty to the officials during a raid. In the afterlife, Nick is hired by Mildred Proctor, the director of Rest In Peace Department (R.I.P.D.), a group of deceased police officers. Nick is assigned the responsibility to fight against the renegade ghosts. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Croods
programme.desc: Grug and his family embark on a journey to search for a new place to live after their cave is destroyed. A young boy helps them trek through unknown places to find new shelter. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Dragonball: Evolution
programme.desc: (Film - Action)

programme.title: Kingsman: The Secret Service
programme.desc: Gary 'Eggsy' Unwin, an unrefined but promising street kid, gets recruited and trained as an agent for a secret spy organisation. He goes through the organisation's gruelling training programme while a global threat emerges from an eccentric genius. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Maleficent: Mistress of Evil
programme.desc: Aurora rules over the kingdom of Moors and Maleficent, her adoptive mother, is its guardian. When Prince Philip proposes to Aurora, Maleficent disapproves of the union. Aurora then begins to question her family ties. But when Queen Ingrith, Philip's mother who hates the fairies of Moor, plots revenge, she finds herself in a soup. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Despicable Me 3
programme.desc: After being fired from the Anti-Villain League, Gru sets out to meet his long-lost twin, Dru, for the first time. But he is soon forced to team up with his brother to take down Balthazar Bratt, a former child star, whose obsession with his 80s character turns him into a supervillain. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: MasterChef Australia
programme.desc: Top Australian chefs judge passionate home cooks who participate in competitive culinary challenges to develop their cooking skills and win the title of the best chef. (TV Show - Reality - Talent)

programme.title: Avengers: Age Of Ultron
programme.desc: The second instalment of the 'Avengers' franchise brings the superheroes back together and this time, the stakes are higher than ever. With a view to stop the world from fighting anymore, Tony Stark enlists Bruce Banner's help to create an artificial intelligence called Ultron. But Tony's habit of playing God will end up costing the world as Ultron's personality takes charge of a robot's body, manufacturing several more like himself to declare war on the human race. Iron Man, Hulk, Captain America, Thor, Hawkeye and Black Widow are joined by a trusted few as they take on this very dangerous villain. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Train To Busan
programme.desc: (Film - Horror)

programme.title: Skyscraper
programme.desc: War veteran Will Sawyer is entrusted with the task of assessing the security of a high-profile building in China. He gets framed when aides of an international terrorist hack into the security system of the building. Sawyer then struggles to prove his innocence and save his family trapped in the fire. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Pirates Of The Caribbean: Salazar's Revenge
programme.desc: (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Filler
programme.desc: (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: Undisputed II Last Man Standing
programme.desc: After being framed for possessing drugs, George is sent to a Russian prison, where he realizes that boxing against inmate Yuri Boyka is the only way out. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Chinese Zodiac
programme.desc: With the 12 ancient animal signs of the 'Chinese Zodiac' stolen, Asian Hawk, brought to life by the phenomenal Jackie Chan who also doubles up as the director of this adrenaline-pumping action film, a mercenary, sets out to retrieve them. Accompanied by a Chinese student and a Parisian lady, Hawk bears it all to emerge successful in this film, which is known to be the third highest grosser in China and also earned two Guinness World Records. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Beauty And The Beast
programme.desc: Belle, a beautiful young woman, agrees to live with the Beast in exchange for the return of her abducted father. Soon, Belle discovers that her hideous captor is actually an enchanted prince. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Pirates Of The Caribbean: At World's End
programme.desc: Captain Barbossa, Will Turner and Elizabeth Swann must save Jack Sparrow and form an alliance with the pirates around the world to fight against the East India Company. (Film - Adventure)

programme.title: The Adventurers
programme.desc: Dan Cheung, an infamous thief, is imprisoned after he miscalculates a heist. When he is released five years later, Dan plans another heist with his old partner and a new recruit. However, Pierre, a French detective, is hot on his trail and tries to recruit Dan's ex-fiance to help bring him to justice. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Reign Of Fire
programme.desc: In the year 2020, the world has been ravaged by the dragons that were accidentally awakened from their slumber by humans. Now it is up to Quinn Abercromby (Christian Bale) and Denton Van Zan (Matthew McConaughey) to save mankind from annihilation. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Mulan
programme.desc: Popular stars Ming-Na, Eddie Murphy, Miguel Ferrer and BD Wong lend their voices to recount a unique Chinese tale of a girl who takes an untrodden path of masquerading as a man just to save her land from the evil invaders. On gauging that her ailing father is in no position to defend his territory, 'Mulan' decides to take his place and lead her army to victory, but an unexpected company awaits her. (Film - Animation)

programme.desc: Top Australian chefs judge passionate home cooks who participate in competitive culinary challenges to develop their cooking skills and win the title of the best chef. (TV Show - Reality - Talent)

programme.title: The Bourne Ultimatum
programme.desc: Legendary assassin Jason Bourne uncovers mysteries of his past, which puts him in the cross-hairs of a superkiller. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Alibaba Marjinaa
programme.desc: Circa the Mughal rule in Persia, Alibaba lives a poor life-style with his mother; married brother Qasim and his wife. When a princess named Marjinaa is being sold in the slave market, Alibaba wants to buy her and set her free, but he does not have the money. So he borrows some money from Qasim, buys Marjinaa, who offers to live with him as his slave for the rest of her life. Alibaba would like to end slavery, but is unable to do anything as he does not have money. Then one day his mother goes to Qasim to borrow some scales, and it is later that Qasim finds out that Alibaba has come across considerable wealth - enough to buy all the slaves and set them free. Qasim gets more information from Alibaba, so that he can also get wealthy. Qasim does not know that he has just signed away the rest of his life, and put the lives of his wife, mother and brother also in grave danger. (Action,Adventure)

programme.title: Saathi
programme.desc: As children, Suraj and Amar had helplessly watched a police inspector beat their poor father to death by throwing him from a window of a multi-storied building. Amar and Suraj grow up and take to petty crime. It is this that leads them to a gangster named Pasha, and it is here that Amar and Suraj will decide to part ways, for Amar does not want to get involved in any gangland activity especially dealing with illicit drugs, while Suraj wants money and wealth and will do anything to get rich. Their paths will cross again, when Suraj accepts a contract to kill a young drug addict named Vicky from testifying against Pasha and his men. What Suraj does not know is that Vicky is the brother of Asha, the woman Amar has fallen in love with, and will do anything to protect her and Vicky. (Action,Romance)

programme.title: Bhishma
programme.desc: Paro, her mother, and her brother, Natwar, find an unconscious man near their town. They bring him over to their house, nurse and nurture him back to good health, only to find out that he has the mind of a 12 year of old child, and name him Bhola. Years pass by, Paro has fallen in love with Bhola, for he rescued her from a molester, and both would like to get married. Before that could happen, Bhola is viciously attacked and left for dead by Paro's molester, and is hospitalized. While in hospital, Police Sub-Inspector Abhimanyu Verma finds out that Bhola is not who he claims to be but a homicidal maniac, wanted for killing three policemen - named Bhisma - and is possibly masquerading as a 12 year old child to hide from the police.

programme.title: The Killer
programme.desc: A cold-blooded contract killer hires the services of a cab driver for a full night. He forces the driver to go around Dubai as he keeps finishing off witnesses scheduled to testify against a gangster.

programme.title: Pardesi
programme.desc: Myna rescues Ajay, who is bitten by a snake, but he loses his memory. He begins a new life with Myna and her family and the two fall in love, much to her secret lover's outrage. (Drama)

programme.title: Hote Hote Pyar Ho Gaya
programme.desc: Pinky and Atul alias Bunty are in love with each other, and plan to marry. They, however, run into opposition with their respective families, as their life-partners have already been picked for them. Pinky's dad, a retired Colonel has picked Police Inspector Arjun to be Pinky's groom; while Ajit and Asha, Bunty's dad and mom, have picked Shobha to be Bunty's bride. Both Bunty and Pinky plan to go through with their respective marriages to the partners of their parents' choices, and then eventually divorce them, and then get married to each other. They give in to their parents' choices, and their parents are delighted and both the weddings take place with great pomp and ceremony. Pinky then starts picking fights with Arjun and his mom, and openly insults them; while Bunty also does the same with Shobha. Their plans seem to be going on track, until they come to know that Shobha and Arjun are meeting on the sly. What impact will this have on their plans and their marriage? (Action,Crime,Romance)

programme.title: 15th August
programme.desc: Nagpal kills Chaudhry and his son, Ram, a military officer. Chaudhry's second son, Vikram, vows to destroy Nagpal who is all set to become the Chief Minister on the upcoming Indian Independence Day.

programme.title: Mr. Natwarlal
programme.desc: Mr. Natwarlal is a 1979 Hindi Action comedy movie. Produced by Tony Glaad it is directed by Rakesh Kumar. Natwar is just a young boy when his beloved older brother and caretaker, police officer Gridharilal (Ajit), is framed for bribery by sinister criminal mastermind Vikram (Amjad Khan). When he grows up, Natwar (Amitabh Bachchan) creates a secret identity for himself, posing as a powerful and mysterious underworld figure named Mr. Natwarlal, determined to slowly but surely exact vengeance on Vikram. - via Wikipedia ( http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mr._Natwarlal ) (Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Badhaai Ho Badhaai
programme.desc: The D'Souza and the Chaddha families are neighbors and have been good friends for as long as they can remember, and despite their diverse religion and cultural beliefs, celebrate Diwali and... (Comedy,Drama,Musical)

programme.title: Aaj Ka Ravan
programme.desc: A series of unfortunate events plague journalist Shanti after a fellow journalist is shot to death on her doorstep

programme.title: Kalyug
programme.desc: The husband of a woman who commits suicide after a run-in with the adult entertainment industry seeks revenge on those who drove her to her death. In doing so, he delves into the world of international human trafficking, eventually traveling across the world to seek out the ringleaders of this horrifying enterprise. (Thriller)

programme.title: Anokhi Ada
programme.desc: A ruthless gangster worms his way into the affections of a timber merchant. Using lies, deceit and murder he plots to usurp the place of the merchant's son, steal his inheritance and his girl. (Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Ghatak: Lethal
programme.desc: A small town in Bombay is brutally subdued by a notorious gangster named Katya and his brothers. (Action,Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Dhaai Akshar Prem Ke
programme.desc: Karan Khanna is an orphan and a captain in the Rajputana Armed Forces. He's madly in love with beautiful model Nisha, with whom he plans to tie the knot during his next leave. On the way to... (Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Eena Meena Deeka
programme.desc: Deeka (Vinod Khanna) had been in jail for several crimes, including bank robberies. When his prison sentence is over, Deeka decides to go straight. Unfortunately, while in a bank, he becomes a victim of a bungling bank robber, Inder or Eena (Rishi Kapoor), who needs money to get medical treatment for his mother (Dina Pathak). When the police arrive, they witness Eena with the notorious bank robber, and come to the conclusion that Deeka has gone back to his criminal ways. Deeka's attempts to convince them are in vain, and he must escape together with Eena for now, and he does so. The police are after Deeka, and he must get a hold of Eena and get him to confess to his crime, and therefore clear his name. But Eena is unwilling to confess, and runs away from Deeka. With the police on his tail, will Deeka be able to capture Eena, and will he be successful in getting him to agree to confess? (Action,Comedy,Crime)

programme.title: Ek Aur Ek Gyarah: By Hook or by Crook
programme.desc: Two petty thieves Tara and Sitara (Govinda & Sanjay Dutt respectively) get on the bad side of two wanted criminals, namely Panther and Cobra (Gulshan Grover and Ashish Vidyarthi ... (Action,Comedy,Musical,Crime,Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Mela
programme.desc: Roopa, a beautiful young village belle is much loved by the villagers of Chandanpur. Chandanpur celebrates a huge Mela every year and this year, they invite a Minister to inaugurate it. In an assassination attempt that follows, a massacre takes place. Chandanpur is devastated and Roopa's family gets wiped out. She vows revenge. Into her life enter two men, the gregarious Kishan and the volatile Shankar, causing much upheaval in their relationship. (Action,Drama)

programme.title: Woh Lamhe
programme.desc: Based upon the life of actress Parveen Babi, this film describes the life of a schizophrenic actress Sana Azim, and the love of her life - Aditya Garewal. (Drama,Romance)

programme.title: China Gate
programme.desc: After witnessing the brutal slaying of her Forest Officer father, Sunder Rajan, at the hands of dreaded dacoit Jageera, Sandhya goes to Colonel Krishnakant Puri and asks for his assistance in bringing an end to Jageera's rule in the Devdurg region. Krishnakant agrees to assist her, and summons about a dozen of his fellow officers and subordinates to assist him. They all assemble at Devdurg with all the necessary ammunitions and arms to combat Jageera, not realizing that Jageera has influence over the local police detachment, who will prevent Puri and his men to possess any guns and weapons. This does not deter Puri and his men, and they continue to stay on in Devdurg and gain the confidence of the villagers. What the villagers do not know that Krishnakant and his men had all been dishonorably discharged from the army for cowardice and retreating when attacked by the enemy. Will Puri and his men abandon Devdurg and let history repeat itself? (Action,Adventure,Drama,Thriller,Western)

programme.title: Dhadkan
programme.desc: Dhadkan is about Anjali (Shilpa Shetty) who is a girl that hails from an extremely rich and influential family. Her father Mr. Chauhan (Kiran Kumar) is a renowned businessman and has many dreams for his daughter. But Anjali is in love with Dev (Sunil Shetty) who is very poor & often cannot even afford to clothe himself properly. Dev also loves Anjali, wants to marry her so has to meet her father. (Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Manikarnika
programme.desc: Story of Rani Lakshmibai, one of the leading figures of the Indian Rebellion of 1857 and her resistance to the British Rule. (History,Drama,Action)

programme.title: Shakti: The Power
programme.desc: A couple visits the husband's family in India and finds itself in the middle of a fratricidal battle. (Action,Drama)

programme.title: Baadshah
programme.desc: K. Jhunjhunwala would like to locate his missing/runaway daughter, Seema Malhotra, so that he can get her married to Nitin Dharampal; Prominent businessman, Mahindra, would like to negotiate with his daughter, Sonu's kidnappers, and secure her release. And the Central Bureau of Investigation would like to protect the life of Chief Minister Gayetri Bachchan under the mission code-named "Maa", and the CBI Officer in Charge to be code-named "Baadshah". Now Baadshah happens to be a bumbling and out of work Private Investigator, who has agreed to assist Jhunjhunwala and Mahindra, and while doing so is mistaken for the CBI Agent, ends up working for the assassins, and must assassinate Gayetri or end up losing his team of four fellow-bumblers, and Mahindra's daughter. What results is hilarious chaos, with no one knowing what the other is doing, and each one being each other's suspect(s). To make matters worse Jhunjhunwala is not really Seema's dad, but someone else with an ulterior motive. (Action,Comedy)

programme.title: Jurm
programme.desc: Police Inspector Shekhar Varma lives in Khar, Bombay, along with his wife, Meena, and a school-going daughter. His office is notified that Editor Ritesh Nandy has received death threats as he come across evidence that would expose some very influential people. (Crime,Romance)

programme.title: Apna Bana Ke Dekho
programme.desc: Jankiraman alias Johny is a hoodlum, known to the local police, has been arrested several times, and lives a poor lifestyle in a city in South India along with his widowed mom. His mother and father had a love marriage, but he died a violent death. She kept her Mangalsutra around his photo frame. Once she talked to a parrot astrologer, who predicted great things in Janikiraman's life, as he will soon be associating with rich people, as well as getting married to a very wealthy girl... (Drama)

programme.title: 15th August
programme.desc: Nagpal kills Chaudhry and his son, Ram, a military officer. Chaudhry's second son, Vikram, vows to destroy Nagpal who is all set to become the Chief Minister on the upcoming Indian Independence Day.

programme.title: Shiva Shakti
programme.desc: Shiva travels to the city to earn money for his sister Kusum's marriage. He meets Shakti and they become friends. When Kusum gets pregnant with Shakti's child, Shiva vows to murder him. (Action,Crime,Drama)

programme.title: Jaagruti
programme.desc: Vishal is a honest and diligent customs officer. He makes it known that he has never nor will ever accept any bribe. This does not auger well with various underworld dons, and even a member of parliament from the ruling party of India. One day Vishal is abducted and brutally killed in the presence of his younger brother, Jugnu. Jugnu himself is missing, and believed dead. Honest and diligent Gandhian Raghunath is outraged by this, and complains to the Chief Minister, Omiji. When Omiji attempts to inquire into this, his son is framed for selling tainted glucose in hospitals, which results in several deaths. Powerless to act, Omiji hesitates, and as a result Raghunath is killed. And then Jugnu returns, and now he must avenge his brother's death, but he is alone, and has an uphill task. (Action,Drama,Musical)

programme.title: Shaktiman
programme.desc: Businessman Rai Bahadur Laxmi Narayan lives a wealthy lifestyle in Bombay along with his wife, Lakshmi. Although they have been married for several years, they have no children. While on a trip to Simla, they get adopt their servant, Diler's son, re-name him Vicky, and bring him back home, much to the dismay of Diler's wife, Parvati. Aometime later, Lakshmi gets pregnant and re-visits Simla, meets with an accident and passes away, leaving behind a new-born son, Amar. Diler wants to kill Amar, but Parvati wants to return him to Laxmi Narayan, and runs away to Bombay. Diler informs his employer that both his wife and son have passed away and have been cremated. Diler re-locates to Bombay, follows her but is unable to locate Parvati. She does reach Bombay along with Amar but she, in turn, is unable to locate Laxmi Narayan. Years later Amar has grown up, lives with Parvati in Versova, works as a Police Inspector in Sion Police Station, and is in love with Priya, the Superintendent of Police's daughter, while Diler is a taxi-driver, and Vicky is an alcoholic and wants to wed Priya. Their lives will soon interline and become complicated with blackmail, deceit, and murder. (Action,Crime,Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Pardesi Babu
programme.desc: Pardesi Babu 1998 (Action,Comedy,Drama)

programme.title: Dhokha
programme.desc: Post-September 11, 2001, Zaid Ahmed Khan lives a wealthy lifestyle in Mumbai and resides in an apartment at Shanti Kutir, Juhu Tara Road, Mumbai, and works as an Assistant Commissioner of Police. One day terrorists strike at a club, killing 20 people, & critically injuring several others. The Police are put on alert, and Zaid is summoned to Police Headquarters to identify a body. To his shock the body turns out to be that of Sarha, his wife - who was not a victim but was a suicide-bomber. While trying to put his life together, Zaid comes across evidence that Sarha may have had an hand in the killings, and thus intrigued he decides to travel to Nasik to find out what really happened, whether his devout Islamic wife was really a terrorist or the victim of a deep-rooted conspiracy. (Drama,Action,Romance,Thriller)

programme.title: Sikka
programme.desc: Two close and very wealthy friends, Vijay and Pranlal, decide to cement their friendship to a relationship when Vijay proposes marriage on behalf of his sister, Shobha, with Pranlal's son, Amar. Pranlal agrees, and preparations are on for the marriage to take place. Vijay finds out that Pranlal and his men are using their business as a front for drugs and smuggling, and he decides to cancel the wedding. Pranlal is angry with Vijay, but refuses to give up his criminal career. When Amar finds out about his dad's spurious activities, he kills himself. Pranlal, humiliated and angered, vows to avenge Amar's death, and wants Shobha to be Amar's widow for the rest of her life, which is not acceptable to Vijay. Then Shobha meets with a handsome stranger named Jackie, who rescues her. She offers him employment with her brother's firm, and they fall in love with each other. (Action,Drama)

programme.title: Jaan Se Pyara
programme.desc: A man tries to lead a double life as a Cop and at the same time look after his retarded twin brother and devoted mother. But then his dangerous police work comes in the way of his family life causing tragedy. (Action,Crime,Drama)

programme.title: Baaghi
programme.desc: Saajan is a college youth, enjoying his life, meets with Kajal the girl of his dreams at a brothel. Kajal is an innocent victim of Dhanraj, who runs this brothel. Saajan eventually falls in love with Kajal, but this love affair is not acceptable to the society, which includes his parents Mr. and Mrs. Sood. Saajan's dad Col. Sood wants his son to join the Indian army. On the other side, this relationship of love is also not acceptable to Dhanraj, since he doesn't want any of his brothel girls to go into normal respectable society. Trapped between both, Saajan, along with his friends, rescues his love from the brothel. But the question remains: Will Saajan's parents accept him along with Kajal or Will Dhanraj's evilness overcome the couple's love? (Action,Romance)

programme.title: Akele Hum Akele Tum
programme.desc: Rohit and wealthy Kiran Dayal meet each other and fall in love. They intend to marry, but Kiran's parents will not permit her to marry beneath her class. Kiran is adamant, and the marriage goes through without the blessings of the Dayals. They live in harmony for months, even after Kiran gives birth to Sunil. Then they start to have differences, which are minor at present, and then snowball... (Drama)

programme.title: Ram Balram
programme.desc: Ram and Balram are 2 young boys who live with their loving parents. Their scheming uncle, Jagatpal, however kills the boy's father and mother. Jagatpal lies to the boys that their parents have been killed in an accident and promises to raise them himself. He enrolls the younger brother Balram, in school and eventually sends him off to join the police force. The older becomes a mechanic. Jagatpal has a tight hold on the boys, even when Ram is an adult, he still gives all his wages to his uncle and is only allowed to keep a few rupees for pocket money. (Action,Comedy,Drama)

programme.title: Showbiz
programme.desc: Rohan Arya lives a wealthy lifestyle in Mumbai and is a professional singer with Showbiz, which is managed by Inder Raj Bahl, while Rohan's personal Manager is Shikha Verma. Rohan and Shikha are attracted to each other, and after Journalist Sharad Rajpoot publishes their photographs, both publicly announce their forthcoming engagement. Then chaos enters their lives when Rohan's car is involved in an accident while he is in the company of a prostitute named Tara. Shikha refuses to have to do anything with him, while a frenzied media focuses in on Rohan's personal life - especially after word gets out that he may have known Tara before he met Shikha. (Action,Crime,Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Asmaan Se Ooncha
programme.desc: Action - A longstanding feud between bitter rivals yields an unexpected friendship in this tale of ambition, violence and love starring Jeetendra and Raj Babbar. Engaged in an ongoing dispute with his archenemy, Nagraj, a man named King sets out to kill the police officer who's interfered in his affairs. But through a remarkable twist of fate, King and the cop end up friends. Now, the two must face the formidable Nagraj -- who wants them both dead. - Ajitesh, Sadashiv Amrapurkar, Raj Babbar (Family,Action,Drama)

programme.title: Loha
programme.desc: A well-meaning but disgraced cop, is determined to fight a corrupt system, taking to task miscreants and criminals in his city. (Action)

programme.title: Daraar
programme.desc: Raj Malhotra lives with his mother, and comes from a very wealthy family. He meets Priya Bhatia, who works with a real estate agency, and instantly falls in love with her. (Thriller,Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Insan
programme.desc: Amjad is a auto-rickshaw driver in Bombay, and lives with his mother in a small tenement in Bombay's slums. His mother had originally given birth to another son, Munna, who has been missing for several years. She is over-joyed when Munna returns home, and both she and Amjad welcome him, and celebrate. They do not know that Munna is now known as Azhar Khan - a member of a Jihaadi terrorist group, who is now using Amjad and his mother as a cover, in order to carry out a deadly and daring terrorist attack. (Drama,War)

programme.title: Mr. Natwarlal
programme.desc: Mr. Natwarlal is a 1979 Hindi Action comedy movie. Produced by Tony Glaad it is directed by Rakesh Kumar. Natwar is just a young boy when his beloved older brother and caretaker, police officer Gridharilal (Ajit), is framed for bribery by sinister criminal mastermind Vikram (Amjad Khan). When he grows up, Natwar (Amitabh Bachchan) creates a secret identity for himself, posing as a powerful and mysterious underworld figure named Mr. Natwarlal, determined to slowly but surely exact vengeance on Vikram. - via Wikipedia ( http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mr._Natwarlal ) (Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Nazar
programme.desc: Bombay Police are baffled when several bar girls and prostitutes are found brutally murdered by a scalpel.

programme.title: Taqdeer Ka Tamasha
programme.desc: A single mother, Geeta, must deal with her two sons, the elder a Police Inspector Suryapratap; while the younger, Satya, a hoodlum, when both get into conflicts. Things only get worse after Satya gets arrested, arguments ensue and he leaves. He gets hired by Sheshnaag for the sole purpose of exacting vengeance against his rival, Deva. Both brothers are fated to meet again when Suryapratap decides to accumulate evidence to arrest Deva. Neither of the brothers know that Deva has an alias, and is determined to thwart any attempt for revenge nor face any charges under the Indian Penal Code. (Action,Crime,Drama)

programme.title: Ustadon Ke Ustad
programme.desc: Vishwanath and Jaikishan are two thieves and good friends. When they try to lead an honest life for the sake of their women, Pukhraj turns them against each other and the two become sworn enemies.

programme.title: Ansh
programme.desc: This story is about Deputy Superintendent of Police Bhagat Pandey (Om Puri), who is thorough, honest, and has an excellent track record of apprehending criminals. This background creates problems for him with other criminals who are closely connected to powerful politicians. As a result he is transferred to Bombay (now know as Mumbai). He takes charge of his post, and transforms everything to a diligent and honest policing machine. Unfortunately, politicians and criminals alike do not like his diligence, and talk about transferring him to Kashmir, where he will be killed in an encounter by a terrorist. Bhagat also comes in touch with suspended Police Inspector Sukhdev Singh, and gangleader, Rajnath Guru, the son of a freedom-fighter, Dinanathji (Aloknath). (Crime,Drama)

programme.title: The Thriller
programme.desc: Simon is the son of Joseph Palathinkal, a business multi millionaire. One night during the night patrol, Niranjan finds Simon stabbed and murdered on a highway. Who killed him? and why? (Crime,Thriller)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A wide range of products manufactured by popular brands can be bought at attractive prices from the comfort of one's home. (Consumer)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A wide range of products manufactured by popular brands can be bought at attractive prices from the comfort of one's home. (Consumer)

programme.title: Sarphira
programme.desc: Judge D.K. Sinha is an honest and hard-working man. He lives with his wife, and two sons, Rajkishan and Suresh. While he is confident that Rajkishan is honest and diligent, he is clearly disappointed with Suresh, who is not only dishonest, but has a violent temper, which gets him into trouble with the police. Imagine the shock the Sinha family gets when they come to know that Suresh has been arrested for murder, and the case has been assigned to Suresh's dad for disposal. (Drama,Action)

programme.title: Man on Mission Jaanbaaz
programme.desc: Sri is a 2005 Telugu film starring Manoj Mancu, Tamanna, and Mohan Babu. (Action)

programme.title: Krishan Avtaar
programme.desc: Police Inspector Krishan Kumar lives a middle class life with his lovely wife, Suman. Suman gets pregnant and gives birth to a baby girl but tragically passes away, leaving Krishan widowed, heart-broken and devastated. Krishan also encounters a tumor, which is presently inoperable, and may eventually lead to his death. Then a large number of the city's children go missing, and Krishan, together with Inspector Avtaar are assigned to investigate this matter. They are also asked to investigate the murder of fellow police inspector Vishnu Sawant. Krishan's investigation leads him to corruption in his very own department; the involvement of a prominent minister in the government; and the daughter of Inspector Sawant himself. Faced with failing health and vision, Krishan must make his move quickly before he becomes totally disabled from doing any more police work. (Action)

programme.title: Diljalaa
programme.desc: Mamta lives a middle-classed lifestyle in Bombay along with widower dad, Ratanmuni Gupta, who works as a Manager with Sharda Chemicals, while she studies in Lovedale College in Manori. Her dad wants her to marry a naive, semi-senile, Munna, the only son of widowed, Sharda, his employer. On the day of the engagement she humiliates her dad, Munna and Sharda and refuses to marry Munna. Shortly thereafter a number of young children die after being injected with medication from Sharda Chemicals, the Police investigate, arrest Sharda, while Munna kills himself. Ratanmuni and his partners, D.S. Mittal, Mehra, Radhey and Shyam, take over Sharda Chemicals and re-name it Friend's Chemicals. Sometime later when Mamta returns from Manori, her dad introduces her to wealthy Mrs. Modi, who wants her to wed her only son, Azad. Both Azad and Mamta approve of each other, meet with each other and get intimate. On the day of their engagement, many surprises await Mamta as she finds out that the man she got intimate with is not the real Azad, while the real Azad and his mom will have nothing to do with a now characterless Mamta. (Action,Crime,Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A wide range of products manufactured by popular brands can be bought at attractive prices from the comfort of one's home. (Consumer)

programme.title: Insaaf Ki Takkar
programme.desc: Laxman Krishna, a criminal lawyer, manages to win all his cases. All the wrong-doers consider him as their God. But things change when he is assigned to defend the convicts who have murdered a girl. (Crime)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A wide range of products manufactured by popular brands can be bought at attractive prices from the comfort of one's home. (Consumer)

programme.title: Pardesi
programme.desc: An honest man is falsely convicted for a crime and is given the death sentence by the judge. Things take a turn when the judge comes across his doppelganger. (Action)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A wide range of products manufactured by popular brands can be bought at attractive prices from the comfort of one's home. (Consumer)

programme.title: Khatron Ke Khiladi
programme.desc: Honest truck driver Balwant watch helplessly as the owners of the trucking company he works for mauled his brother, Jaswant to death. When he lodges a complaint with the police the inspector instead arrest him for this crime; the trucking company owners then burn his house killing his pregnant wife Sumati. Years later Balwant who now calls himself Karamvir operates a court called 'Teesri Adalat' by sentencing wrong-doers to death in a judge and executer style. However he is unaware that Sumati is still alive and has given birth to twins Rajesh and Mahesh; while Mahesh was separated at birth and grows up with Inspector Ram Avtar and his wife - Rajesh is taking care of his mother as she loses her mental balance in the trauma. Rajesh and Mahesh do get to unite as the girls they are in love with are link to each other. After a few misjudgments of situations at hand Rajesh and Mahesh decides that they will bring Teesri Adalat to the court of law - at any cost. (Action,Drama)

programme.title: Khiladi Bhaiya
programme.desc: Athadu is a Action Movie Directed by Trivikram Srinivas Rao.Nandu (Mahesh Babu), an orphan, is a top-notch professional killer in town. He maneuvers his operations with the help of his buddy (Sonu Sood). In one such operation, he falls into the eyes of the cops. While fleeing from the crime scene, he unintentionally becomes the cause for the death of a stranger called Pardhoo (Rajiv Kanakala), a run-away youngster who wants to return home after 12 years. Nandu assumes the identity of Pardhoo and enters his household in a remote village to escape from the cops. The rest of the story is all about how Nandu solves all the problems. (Action,Thriller)

programme.desc: Aarti trusts Abhay and tells him that she has escaped from the clutches of Pandu, a rowdy. But little does she know that her life is at stake as Abhay informs Pandu about it. (Action)

programme.title: Mera Pati Sirf Mera Hai
programme.desc: Roopa lives a wealthy lifestyle with her husband, Prakash Chandra, who works for her dad, Manoharlal Verma, and a daughter named Sharda alias Pinky. Roopa and Prakash do not get along and Roopa suspects that Prakash is having an affair. Her suspicious nature gets a boost when a woman named Sharda Dayal Sharma moves into a house next door. Roopa starts vile rumors about Sharda having an affair with Prakash. (Drama,Family)

Now Sree is an ASP (Assistant Superintendent of Police) of Kottayam and Milan is a renowned reporter in the same city. Though in different fields both are in highly responsible jobs. In effect, both of them use their friendship to fulfill their respective social responsibilities. (Crime,Thriller)

programme.title: Golmaal
programme.desc: Gopal, Lucky, Madhav and Laxman - four guys bound together by their child-like notoriety, aimlessness and petty business of conning people for fun and money. Laxman is an intelligent student who is not allowed to pass by his mischievous band of friends Gopal, Madhav and mute Lucky. This is because all four friends use his hostel room to conduct their activities. He is peer-pressured into running a series of scams in order to earn himself and his friends some money. Once thrown out of college bag-n-baggage, the naughty foursome finds refuge in the bungalow of a blind couple as their grandson. A cat mouse game unfolds as Laxman's body and Gopal's voice makes for Sameer (The grandson from US). (Comedy,Family)

programme.title: Rishtey
programme.desc: uraj Singh (Anil Kapoor) is in love with the beautiful and wealthy Komal (Karisma Kapoor). They dream of their perfect family together but her arrogant father Yashpal Chaudhary (Action,Drama)

programme.title: Tholi Prema
programme.desc: Aaditya is an impulsive individual who takes decisions spontaneously and is unafraid to speak his mind. The love of his life Varsha is his extreme opposite — she chooses not to let her emotions control her actions or words. Will these two differing individuals ever make their relationship work? (Comedy,Romance)

programme.title: Ab Tumhare Hawale Watan Saathiyo
programme.desc: Major General Amarjeet Singh (Amitabh Bachchan) is a dedicated officer for the Indian army. His son Lieutenant Commander Vikramjeet Singh (Bobby Deol) follows in his footsteps and joins the army. Amarjeet is extremely proud of Vikramjeet but tragedy strikes when Vikramjeet is killed in action. Many years pass, Vikramjeet's son Captain Kunal Singh (Bobby Deol) joins the army but has no intentions of remaining there. He instead plans to leave, settle abroad and earn lots of money. Amarjeet is disappointed with Kunal as he hopes his grandson would do something to honour his deceased father. Kunal comes across a desert party and sees Shweta Bhansali (Divya Khosla). It is love at first sight for him but she totally ignores him and does everything to avoid him. However she is doing this for a reason- she was once married. Shweta fell in love and married Major Rajeev Singh (Akshay Kumar), unfortunately he was deployed for action on his wedding day and he had to leave his newly wed bride. (Action,Drama,Romance,War)

programme.title: Bharat
programme.desc: At the cusp of India's birth as an Independent nation, a family makes an arduous journey to freedom at a cost. A young boy Bharat, makes a promise to his Father that he will keep his family together no matter what. (Drama,Action)

programme.title: Boyz 2 Men
programme.desc: Five college boys while away their time by going after girls and getting drunk. However, they are forced to earn a living when one of them gets married against his parents' wishes. (Drama)

programme.title: Resident Evil: Apocalypse
programme.desc: As the city is locked down under quarantine, Alice joins a small band of elite soldiers, enlisted to rescue the missing daughter of the creator of the mutating T-virus. It's a heart-pounding race against time as the group faces off against hordes of blood- thirsty zombies, stealthy Lickers, mutant canines and the most sinister foe yet. (Horror,Action,Science Fiction)

programme.title: F.A.L.T.U
programme.desc: The story is focused on four good-for-nothing friends, Ritesh, Puja, Nanj and Vishnu. All four of them are always rejected from a administration to college. Therefore, they fake their own college named Fakirchand and Lakirchand Trust University (F.A.L.T.U) with the help of Google Chand and Bajirao, only to see their parents happy. However the sparks will fly and the learning will take a twist when all is revealed. (Comedy)

programme.title: Commando 2
programme.desc: India's most wanted Black Money agent, Vicky Chaddha, gets arrested in Malaysia and is kept in a safe house by the Malaysian authorities, along with his wife. A team of four is being sent to Malaysia to bring them to India. Apart from the growth of inter-personal relationships, the mission has quite a few twists and turns on its way. The story follows Karan as he uses his brain and brawn to recover all of the laundered black money. (Action)

programme.title: Hero Hindustani
programme.desc: After the passing away of his son and Caucasian daughter-in-law, London-based widower Purshotam Agarwal brings up his granddaughter, Namrata, on his own. When she matures, he pressurizes her to get married to Tikamgarh-based Ranveer's son. She travels to India, and much to his chagrin refuses to get married to the boy of his choice, and instead brings back a wealthy male named Romi, who she claims is her fiancé. Little does Purshotam know that Romi is not who he claims to be, and that Namrata has no intention of marrying him either. (Action,Comedy,Drama)

programme.title: Kaho Naa... Pyaar Hai
programme.desc: Rich girl loves poor guy, who is killed. She sees him again only to realise hes a look alike. Together they avenge the death. (Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Freaky Ali
programme.desc: A debt collector becomes a major sensation when he takes on the rich man's sport of golfing. (Comedy,Romance)

programme.title: Khiladi 786
programme.desc: The 8th installment in the Khiladi series. (Action,Comedy)

programme.title: Monster Hunter
programme.desc: Captain Artemis and her group of soldiers are pulled into a world where dangerous monsters and humans co-exist. Grappled by danger, they must find a way to escape with help from a mysterious hunter. (Fantasy)
